title: Fiji Water company website font - what is it?
content:
Hi everyone, long time lurker here with a question. Can anyone identify this font that is used throughout the FIJI Water website? Sorry for the low image quality and size - these were taken from said website.

[http://fijigreen.com/index.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234435/http:/fijigreen.com/index.html "http://fijigreen.com/index.html")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234435im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fijigreen3_4049.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234435im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fijigreen2_3457.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20111211234435im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fijigreen1_4245.jpg)

Your wisdom is much appreciated!

-CB
author: codi
